Module com.example.fiftyclash
Package com.example.fiftyclash.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.fiftyclash.controllers.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class handles the game logic, user interaction, and updates the UI components. It manages player turns, machine turns, and the interaction with the game model.

  • Method Details

    • getCardValues

      public void getCardValues(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the card selection by the player. Highlights the selected card and enables the play button.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent triggered when a card is clicked.

    • turnManagement

      public void turnManagement(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Manages the turns of the player and the machines. Updates the UI and handles game logic for turns.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered when the play button is clicked.

    • isLastMachine

      public boolean isLastMachine(int index)
      Checks if the specified machine is the last active machine.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the machine to check.
      Returns:
      true if the specified machine is the last active machine, false otherwise.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(String playerName, int machinesAmount)
      Initializes the game with the player's name and number of machines. Sets up the initial game state and updates the UI.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player.
      machinesAmount - the number of machines in the game.

    • playerTurn

      public void playerTurn()
      Executes the player's turn, updating the game state and UI.

    • machineTurn

      public void machineTurn(int index)
      Executes the turn for a machine, updating the game state and UI.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the machine taking the turn.

    • updateCard

      public void updateCard(int index, String number, String icon)
      Updates the UI representation of a card with the given details.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the card.
      number - the card's number.
      icon - the card's suit/icon.

    • hidePlayerCard

      public void hidePlayerCard(int index)
      Hides the player's card at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the card to hide.

      cardIndex - the index of the card to hide.

      Parameters:
      machineIndex - the index of the machine.
      cardIndex - the index of the card to show.

    • revealMachineHand

      public void revealMachineHand(int machineIndex)
      Reveals the entire hand of a machine.
      Parameters:
      machineIndex - the index of the machine whose hand will be revealed.

      machineIndex - the index of the machine whose hand will be hidden.
